languages.text: Выбирая стратегию, Лорд-капитану пришлось принять во внимание и низкую благонадежность населения мира, обнаруженную корабельными медиками, высаженными на планету для сопровождения наступательных отрядов. Их отчеты указывали на широкое распространение генетических аномалий среди обитателей колонии, у которых не было логического объяснения.

traits.locale_text: Выбирая стратегию, Лорду-капитану пришлось принять во внимание и низкую благонадежность населения мира, обнаруженную корабельными медиками. Их отчеты указывали на широкое распространение генетических аномалий среди обитателей колонии, у которых не было логического объяснения.

languages.text: In choosing a strategy, the Lord Captain had to consider the limited trustworthiness of the world's population, which was uncovered by the ship's medics deployed on the planet to support the offensive. Their reports indicated widespread genetic anomalies in the colony's inhabitants for which there was no logical explanation.
languages.original_text: Выбирая стратегию, Лорд-капитану пришлось принять во внимание и низкую благонадежность населения мира, обнаруженную корабельными медиками, высаженными на планету для сопровождения наступательных отрядов. Их отчеты указывали на широкое распространение генетических аномалий среди обитателей колонии, у которых не было логического объяснения.

Their reports indicated widespread genetic anomalies in the colony's inhabitants for which there was no logical explanation.

In choosing a strategy, the Lord Captain had to consider the limited trustworthiness of the world's population, which was uncovered by the ship's medics deployed on the planet to support the offensive. Their reports indicated widespread genetic anomalies in the colony's inhabitants for which there was no logical explanation.

languages.text: 攻撃支援を目的としてこの惑星に配備した船の衛生兵により、明らかになった事実があった。つまり、ロード・キャプテンが戦略を選ぶに際し、この星の住民を完全には信用できない点を考慮しなくてはならなかったのだ。衛生兵の報告によると、論理的に説明がつかない遺伝子異常がコロニー住民にまん延しているらしい。
languages.original_text: In choosing a strategy, the Lord Captain had to consider the limited trustworthiness of the world's population, which was uncovered by the ship's medics deployed on the planet to support the offensive. Their reports indicated widespread genetic anomalies in the colony's inhabitants for which there was no logical explanation.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃支援を目的としてこの惑星に配備した船の衛生兵により、明らかになった事実があった。つまり、ロード・キャプテンが戦略を選ぶに際し、この星の住民を完全には信用できない点を考慮しなくてはならなかったのだ。衛生兵の報告によると、論理的に説明がつかない遺伝子異常がコロニー住民にまん延しているらしい。

languages.text: 在选择战略时，舰长大人必须考虑到这个世界居民的可信度有限。这个问题是部署在这颗行星上，负责支援进攻的舰载医护人员发现的。医护人员的报告显示，殖民地居民的基因普遍发生了异常状况，这样的问题无法用通常的逻辑进行解释。
languages.original_text: In choosing a strategy, the Lord Captain had to consider the limited trustworthiness of the world's population, which was uncovered by the ship's medics deployed on the planet to support the offensive. Their reports indicated widespread genetic anomalies in the colony's inhabitants for which there was no logical explanation.

traits.locale_text: 在选择战略时，舰长大人必须考虑到这个世界居民的可信度有限。这个问题是部署在这颗行星上，负责支援进攻的舰载医护人员发现的。医护人员的报告显示，殖民地居民的基因普遍发生了异常状况，这样的问题无法用通常的逻辑进行解释。

languages.text: Al decantarse por una estrategia, {mf|el Lord Capitán|la Lord Capitán} debía tomar en consideración la escasa fiabilidad de la población planetaria, descubierta por el personal médico de la nave desplegado en la superficie como apoyo para la ofensiva. Sus informes revelan la presencia de anomalías genéticas generalizadas en los habitantes de la colonia para las que no existe ninguna explicación lógica.
languages.original_text: In choosing a strategy, the Lord Captain had to consider the limited trustworthiness of the world's population, which was uncovered by the ship's medics deployed on the planet to support the offensive. Their reports indicated widespread genetic anomalies in the colony's inhabitants for which there was no logical explanation.

traits.locale_text: Al decantarse por una estrategia, {mf|el Lord Capitán|la Lord Capitán} debía tomar en consideración la escasa fiabilidad de la población planetaria, descubierta por el personal médico de la nave desplegado en la superficie como apoyo para la ofensiva. Sus informes revelan la presencia de anomalías genéticas generalizadas en los habitantes de la colonia para las que no existe ninguna explicación lógica.

languages.text: Bei der Wahl einer Strategie musste der Lord Captain die begrenzte Vertrauenswürdigkeit der Bevölkerung der Welt berücksichtigen, was die Ärzte des Schiffs herausgefunden hatten, die auf dem Planeten die Offensive unterstützen sollten. Ihre Berichte wiesen auf weit verbreitete genetische Anomalien bei den Einwohnern der Kolonie hin, für die es keine logische Erklärung gab.
languages.original_text: In choosing a strategy, the Lord Captain had to consider the limited trustworthiness of the world's population, which was uncovered by the ship's medics deployed on the planet to support the offensive. Their reports indicated widespread genetic anomalies in the colony's inhabitants for which there was no logical explanation.

traits.locale_text: Bei der Wahl einer Strategie musste der Lord Captain die begrenzte Vertrauenswürdigkeit der Bevölkerung der Welt berücksichtigen, was die Ärzte des Schiffs herausgefunden hatten, die auf dem Planeten die Offensive unterstützen sollten. Ihre Berichte wiesen auf weit verbreitete genetische Anomalien bei den Einwohnern der Kolonie hin, für die es keine logische Erklärung gab.

languages.text: Au moment de choisir une stratégie, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} dut tenir compte de la fiabilité limitée des habitants de la planète, un état de fait qui avait été mis au jour par les médecins du vaisseau envoyés sur Janus pour soutenir l'offensive. Leurs rapports signalaient des anomalies génétiques généralisées chez les membres de la colonie, sans aucune explication logique quant à leur origine.
languages.original_text: In choosing a strategy, the Lord Captain had to consider the limited trustworthiness of the world's population, which was uncovered by the ship's medics deployed on the planet to support the offensive. Their reports indicated widespread genetic anomalies in the colony's inhabitants for which there was no logical explanation.

traits.locale_text: Au moment de choisir une stratégie, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} dut tenir compte de la fiabilité limitée des habitants de la planète, un état de fait qui avait été mis au jour par les médecins du vaisseau envoyés sur Janus pour soutenir l'offensive. Leurs rapports signalaient des anomalies génétiques généralisées chez les membres de la colonie, sans aucune explication logique quant à leur origine.

languages.text: Strateji seçiminde Lord Kaptan, dünyanın nüfusunun güvenilirliğini göz önünde bulundurmak zorunda kaldı. Bu husus, geminin saldırı timlerine destek olarak gönderdiği sıhhiyecilerce keşfedildi. Raporlara göre koloni sakinlerinde, mantıklı bir açıklaması olmayan genetik anormallikler gözlemlenmişti.
languages.original_text: In choosing a strategy, the Lord Captain had to consider the limited trustworthiness of the world's population, which was uncovered by the ship's medics deployed on the planet to support the offensive. Their reports indicated widespread genetic anomalies in the colony's inhabitants for which there was no logical explanation.

traits.locale_text: Strateji seçiminde Lord Kaptan, dünyanın nüfusunun güvenilirliğini göz önünde bulundurmak zorunda kaldı. Bu husus, geminin saldırı timlerine destek olarak gönderdiği sıhhiyecilerce keşfedildi. Raporlara göre koloni sakinlerinde, mantıklı bir açıklaması olmayan genetik anormallikler gözlemlenmişti.
